# Interface NodeErrorConfig15

Optional error handling configuration for the node

interface NodeErrorConfig15 {  
error_codes?: (  
| "OK"  
| "CANCELLED"  
| "UNKNOWN"  
| "INVALID_ARGUMENT"  
| "DEADLINE_EXCEEDED"  
| "NOT_FOUND"  
| "ALREADY_EXISTS"  
| "PERMISSION_DENIED"  
| "RESOURCE_EXHAUSTED"  
| "FAILED_PRECONDITION"  
| "ABORTED"  
| "OUT_OF_RANGE"  
| "UNIMPLEMENTED"  
| "INTERNAL"  
| "UNAVAILABLE"  
| "DATA_LOSS"  
| "UNAUTHENTICATED"  
)[];  
fallback_result?: { [k: string]: unknown };  
max_retries?: string | number;  
}

##### Index

### Properties

error_codes? fallback_result? max_retries?

## Properties

### `Optional`error_codes

error_codes?: (  
| "OK"  
| "CANCELLED"  
| "UNKNOWN"  
| "INVALID_ARGUMENT"  
| "DEADLINE_EXCEEDED"  
| "NOT_FOUND"  
| "ALREADY_EXISTS"  
| "PERMISSION_DENIED"  
| "RESOURCE_EXHAUSTED"  
| "FAILED_PRECONDITION"  
| "ABORTED"  
| "OUT_OF_RANGE"  
| "UNIMPLEMENTED"  
| "INTERNAL"  
| "UNAVAILABLE"  
| "DATA_LOSS"  
| "UNAUTHENTICATED"  
)[]

List of status codes that should trigger retry behavior

### `Optional`fallback_result

fallback_result?: { [k: string]: unknown }

Default result to return if all retries are exhausted

### `Optional`max_retries

max_retries?: string | number

The maximum number of retry attempts for failed operations
